text: Millions of workers face unpredictable schedules that can change dramatically day-to-day—even by the hour—with almost no advance warning. A third of workers involuntarily work part-time because they aren't assigned enough hours by giant corporations trying to keep costs down.

❌ Require big companies to offer available hours to part-time employees before hiring new employees/subcontractors
❌ Make more part-time employees eligible for FMLA
❌ Give part-time workers access to pension plans
